text:
Challah, cholent... and immunity to #COVID19? 

In @BneiBrak_Muni the city is getting creative to encourage its large ultra-Orthodox population to get vaccinated. Each person gets cholent and challah take-away after getting the #vaccine.

(Photo by Eitan Elhadez-Barak/TPS) https://t.co/DWRSzg57Xk
